title: Shock Video Of Massive Red Pills (Ep 1615)
description:
Watch this video! It shows massive red-pills being dropped on vaccine mandates and the collusion hoax. In this episode I address the video along with a story about the dangers of the digital economy. 

News Picks:

Is cancel culture finally cannibalizing itself?

Was the DNC really hacked by the Russians?


Psaki does damage control after Mark Milley throws him under the bus. 


Biden’s tyrannical vaccine mandate could result in $700k fines!
